question: Who of the following gave the slogan “Inquilab Zindabad”?
explanation: The famous slogan Inquilab Zindabad was given by Hasrat Mohani. This famous slogan inspired the activities of the Hindustan Socialist Republican Association particularly Ashfaqulla Khan, Bhagat Singh and Chandrashekhar Azad.  Zindabad means wishing longivity and prosper.
